mapper.sql: a.xh AS "xh", a.ny AS "ny", a.djh AS "djh", a.lrrq AS "lrrq", a.ksdm AS "ksdm", a.czyh AS "czyh", a.jzczyh AS "jzczyh", a.jzrq AS "jzrq", a.ghdwdm AS "ghdwdm", a.ghdwmc AS "ghdwmc", a.ypje_pf AS "ypjePf", a.ypje_ls AS "ypjeLs", a.thje AS "thje", a.jzbz AS "jzbz", a.jlzt AS "jlzt", a.fph AS "fph", a.fprq AS "fprq", a.memo AS "memo", a.thfs AS "thfs", a.fkxh AS "fkxh", a.jxje AS "jxje", a.gzbz AS "gzbz", a.dpbz AS "dpbz", a.dprq AS "dprq", a.dpczyh AS "dpczyh", a.ysczyh AS "ysczyh", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.hospital_code AS "hospitalCode", a.hospital_name AS "hospitalName"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_ypthzd( xh, ny, djh, lrrq, ksdm, czyh, jzczyh, jzrq, ghdwdm, ghdwmc, ypje_pf, ypje_ls, thje, jzbz, jlzt, fph, fprq, memo, thfs, fkxh, jxje, gzbz, dpbz, dprq, dpczyh, ysczyh, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, hospital_code, hospital_name ) VALUES ( #{xh}, #{ny}, #{djh}, #{lrrq}, #{ksdm}, #{czyh}, #{jzczyh}, #{jzrq}, #{ghdwdm}, #{ghdwmc}, #{ypjePf}, #{ypjeLs}, #{thje}, #{jzbz}, #{jlzt}, #{fph}, #{fprq}, #{memo}, #{thfs}, #{fkxh}, #{jxje}, #{gzbz}, #{dpbz}, #{dprq}, #{dpczyh}, #{ysczyh}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{hospitalCode}, #{hospitalName} )

INSERT INTO medsto_ypthzd( xh, ny, djh, lrrq, ksdm, czyh, jzczyh, jzrq, ghdwdm, ghdwmc, ypje_pf, ypje_ls, thje, jzbz, jlzt, fph, fprq, memo, thfs, fkxh, jxje, gzbz, dpbz, dprq, dpczyh, ysczyh, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, hospital_code, hospital_name ) VALUES
( #{item.xh}, #{item.ny}, #{item.djh}, #{item.lrrq}, #{item.ksdm}, #{item.czyh}, #{item.jzczyh}, #{item.jzrq}, #{item.ghdwdm}, #{item.ghdwmc}, #{item.ypjePf}, #{item.ypjeLs}, #{item.thje}, #{item.jzbz}, #{item.jlzt}, #{item.fph}, #{item.fprq}, #{item.memo}, #{item.thfs}, #{item.fkxh}, #{item.jxje}, #{item.gzbz}, #{item.dpbz}, #{item.dprq}, #{item.dpczyh}, #{item.ysczyh}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.hospitalCode}, #{item.hospitalName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_ypthzd SET xh = #{xh}, ny = #{ny}, djh = #{djh}, lrrq = #{lrrq}, ksdm = #{ksdm}, czyh = #{czyh}, jzczyh = #{jzczyh}, jzrq = #{jzrq}, ghdwdm = #{ghdwdm}, ghdwmc = #{ghdwmc}, ypje_pf = #{ypjePf}, ypje_ls = #{ypjeLs}, thje = #{thje}, jzbz = #{jzbz}, jlzt = #{jlzt}, fph = #{fph}, fprq = #{fprq}, memo = #{memo}, thfs = #{thfs}, fkxh = #{fkxh}, jxje = #{jxje}, gzbz = #{gzbz}, dpbz = #{dpbz}, dprq = #{dprq}, dpczyh = #{dpczyh}, ysczyh = #{ysczyh}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}, hospital_name = #{hospitalName} WHERE id = #{id}
